entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
